DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety immune response GlaxoSmithKline Tdap vaccine compare licensed Td vaccine use booster healthy adolescent ( 10-18 year age ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Combined Tdap Vaccine Used As A Booster Compared To Licensed Td Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: A combined Tdap ( Tetanus , Diphteria , Acellular Pertussis ) Vaccine Used Booster compare Licensed Td ( Tetanus Diphteria ) vaccine
DOC.criteria: Healthy adolescent history complete routine vaccination diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis ( DTP ) . Use investigational drug vaccine 30 day precede study vaccination . Chronic administration immunosuppressant . Administration preschool DTP vaccine within previous 5 year . Administration Td booster within previous 10 year .
